about_the_game:
After the great invasion, the muha-s mutated and are gearing up for war again! Buzzopolis is the first line of defense. We can't let the city fall to the enemy! Save Buzzopolis, and then the whole world! Brave hero, MUHABOY!

Chase down muha-s and cleanse the city of mutants while dealing with limited resources, tricky enemies, and challenging battle scenarios


In the game, you’ll encounter various types of muha-s. Each type has its own personality, habits, reaction speed, and level of cowardice. And they complement each other beautifully. Find the best strategy for any combination of enemies, because your muha swatters have limited durability.

Use muha swatters with different effects


The game offers several types of muha swatters, each with its own unique effects. They aren’t tied to specific types of muha-s, giving every player a chance to get creative. Find your favorite muha swatter, combine them, or develop a strategy that lets you make the most of your resources in any combat situation.

Earn coins and redistribute your resources


Your muha swatters have limited durability. But you can buy and sell durability, exchanging actual hits for coins. There’s no penalty for buying and selling, so even if you purchase durability or a muha swatter, you can sell them later without losing a single coin. This opens up extra opportunities for experimentation.

Craft your own strategy, be quick, do whatever it takes—just save Buzzopolis!

name: Muhaboy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the shoes of Muhaboy! Dash and smash muha-s in this wild tactical beat 'em up, saving humanity from the looming Second Muha War! Battle it out with limited resources and adapt to the ever-changing chaos. Buzzopolis is waiting for its hero—time to show those muha-s who’s boss!
